# Want to add a resource? {#howto}

Here is a collection of *Data Science* resources on the **R** programming language and beyond.

If you want to contribute, see a typo or have any questions, please open an *issue* or a *pull request* at the {{< fa brands github >}} [repository](https://github.com/materov/rsources-book){.external target="_blank"}.
